name: Some Robot Balls are looking for squares
name_original: Some Robot Balls are looking for squares
description:
- - - - - -  What's that  - - - - - -

Small project. Its incomplete but hey, it got me back in Unity for the first time in 6 months so that's really cool.

- - - - - -  How to play  - - - - - -

Use WASD, that's gonna get you going.

Q's gonna let you swap robots.

Don't forget to stay hydrated.

If you're making some mistake you can always press Z to undo.

Man my HTML build didn't work, so just ALT+F4 to escape. I'm so sorry.

- - - - - - Music used - - - - - -

 Ludum Dare 38 - Track 2 - made by Abstraction, http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
